body.p: If you're a technical writer or content professional:

ul.li: Start practicing by building small DITA topics and experimenting with DITA-OT for local publishing.
Explore commercial tools like Oxygen XML Editor or easyDITA to gain hands-on experience with structured workflows.
Evaluate how DITA fits into your content strategy or enterprise documentation pipeline.
Consider piloting DITA on a small documentation set to measure efficiency gains and reuse potential within your organization.
dita.xml.org: The official DITA website for specifications and community resources.
Tool vendor documentation: Explore resources from DITA tool vendors (e.g., Oxygen XML Editor, SDL Tridion Docs, Adobe Experience Manager) for practical implementation details.
